SWISS AGENCY FOR DEVELOPMENT AND COOPERATION - SDC
outputs.output_descr: This project aims to provide higher impact of migration on local development by up-scaling selected local authorities' initiatives and provision of capacity development initiatives in the Philippines, by networking up-scaled projects with other local development actors and sharing of lessons learned, and by connecting local authorities internationally to facilitate partnership building and knowledge sharing.
